title: Did Dolly Parton Say This About ‘Dixie’ Being An ‘Offensive’ Word?
subtitle: The "Jolene" singer talked about the word amid renewed conversations on cancel culture.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Singer Dolly Parton said of the use of the word "Dixie" in her "Dixie Stampede" dinner attraction: When "you realize that [something] is a problem, you should fix it. Don’t be a dumbass."
